original.html:
<button class="cursor-pointer bg-gradient-to-r from-[#EB3349] to-[#F45C43] px-6 py-2 rounded text-white font-semibold shadow-[rgba(6,_24,_44,_0.4)_0px_0px_0px_2px,_rgba(6,_24,_44,_0.65)_0px_4px_6px_-1px,_rgba(255,_255,_255,_0.08)_0px_1px_0px_inset] hover:shadow-[rgba(6,_24,_44,_0.4)_0px_0px_0px_2px,_rgba(6,_24,_44,_0.65)_0px_4px_6px_-10px,_rgba(255,_255,_255,_0.08)_0px_1px_0px_inset] focus:shadow-[inset_-12px_-8px_40px_#46464620] transition-shadow">
  Button
</button>
